law.catch_line: Candidate's name to appear but once.
law.text: No judicial candidate's name shall appear on any voting machine or absentee ballot more than once.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 296, sec. 21, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 54, sec. 13, effective March 10, 1976.
